name: W10
0:
”Alexa,tell smart cat to arm”
”Alexa,tell smart cat to disArm”
”Alexa,tell smart cat to home arm”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart cat
des:
W10 skill is W10 App solution kits, had include one smart hardware device. To user your Amazon Echo with your W10, make sure you have the latest Alexa app on your phone, you have your W10 skill, and activate the W10 Skill. This will require your W10 app account email and password to authorize Alexa to access your devices.
To get started ,select the "Enable Skill" button in the Alexa App to link your W10 app account, Then the next step needs to be entered a special PIN Code.
When using the skill, All disarm commands require a PIN Code. For each command, you can supply the PIN code with the command or wait for Alexa to ask you for your PIN Code. 
You can control the W10 device by EcHo,for example,you can say:
1.Alexa,tell smart cat arm
2.Alexa,tell smart cat disArm with PIN CODE XXX
3.Alexa,tell smart cat home arm
4.Alexa,tell smart cat to arm
5.Alexa,tell smart cat to disArm using PIN CODE XXX
6.Alexa,tell smart cat to home arm
